Package it.polimi.ingsw.messages.utils

Class UpdateWriter

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.messages.utils.UpdateWriter
public class UpdateWriter
extends java.lang.Object
This class create the update messages sent by the server

      a - first floor to swap
      b - second floor to swap
      Returns:
      message to swap deposit floors

    • buyCardAccepted

      Parameters:
      user - the player's nickname
      x - row index in crad market
      y - column index in card market
      Returns:
      message to buy development cards
